titleStmt.title: A petition of the gentry, ministers, and freeholders of the county of Flint, presented to His Majesty at York, August the fourth, 1642. With His Majesties most gracious answer thereunto. Also His Majesties speech to the gentlemen of York, on Thursday the fourth of August.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I).

notesStmt.note: Pagination begins on verso of title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
